intro: Gorteria rigida, commonly known as the rigid gorteria, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Gorteria rigida is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens due to its delicate appearance and ability to thrive in well-drained soils.
